#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int sum,digit,n,t,n1,n2,flag;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n1);
		flag=0;
		while(flag!=1)
		{
			
			n1++;
			n=n1;
			n2=0;
			while(n>0)
			{
				digit=n%10;
				n=n/10;
				n2=n2*10 + digit;
			}
			if(n1==n2)
			{
				cout<<n1<<"\n";
			    flag=1;
				break;
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
